TextBlock.Text: PRIVET: To all Nomai who journey here for the quantum pilgrimage, record the time you took to complete this trial on this scroll for posterity! I shall be humble: my time was a patient 4 minutes and 39 seconds!
CLARY: I completed this quantum trial in 1 minute and 17 seconds - but I had the advantage of knowing the lesson it taught ahead of time. Anyone who beats my record is welcome to tell me!
POKE: Hah! 1 minute 12 seconds, Clary! I can't wait to see the look on her face when I tell her...
PYE: Well, full disclosure: any Nomai aware of the <color=orange>rule of quantum entanglement</color> has a rather unfair advantage in this competition.
PYE: I feel guilty compromising the integrity of this score.. so I'll leave the secret for future explorers.
PYE: You can <color=orange>turn off the lights</color> inside the tower using the <color=orange>control interface at the top of the tower.</color>
PYE: Just remember: the tractor beams meant to catch your fall entering each chamber will also become deactivated. Be cautious and curious on your journey!
